Container.Name: Cribl-Edge-Managed
Container.Overview:
Cribl Edge helps you collect and process observability data – logs, metrics, application data, etc. – in real time, from your Linux and Windows machines, apps, microservices etc., and deliver them to Cribl Stream or any supported destination. - Automatic discovery of host, container and application metrics, logs, etc. on endpoints. - Great Getting Data In (GDI) experience: explore, preview, build configs etc. - Collect, Process and Forward: - Collect logs, metrics (host, process, container), traces (coming soon), custom command output etc. - All the processing power of functions & pipelines at your fingertips - Forward data to any of the many supported destinations
This template will deploy a Cribl Edge instance running in Managed Edge mode. Managed Edge mode is intended to be managed by a Leader and CANNOT manage other instances. Please ensure you are running a Leader instance prior to deploying this template.

Config.Name: Docker Socket
Config.Description: Path to allow Edge to scrape information from unRAID Docker environment

Config.Name: File Monitor Path
Config.Description: Path to allow Edge to monitor files on the host system

Config.Name: Distributed Mode
Config.Description: Flag to manage this Edge node from a different Leader node.

Config.Description:
